SEARCH
Package sh.brane.core

Class LogFormatter

java.lang.Object
sh.brane.core.LogFormatter
public final class LogFormatter extends Object
Modern log formatter for Brane SDK with colored, structured output.

This class provides formatted logging methods that produce consistent, visually clear output for RPC calls, transactions, and other SDK operations. All formatters use the modern color palette from AnsiColors and status symbols (✓ ✗ ○) to indicate success, failure, and pending states.

Design Philosophy

  • Status symbols only - Symbols (✓ ✗ ○) indicate status, not operation type
  • Consistent bracketed format - All logs use [OPERATION] style
  • Shortened hashes - Long hex values truncated to 0x1234...5678 format
  • Human-readable time - Durations shown as 1.5ms or 10.0s
  • Multi-line for complexity - Complex data (like CALL requests) formatted across lines

Log Types

Method Format Color Use Case
formatCall [CALL] Indigo RPC call requests
formatCallResult ✓ [CALL-RESULT] Teal Successful RPC responses
formatRpcError ✗ [RPC-ERROR] Coral RPC failures
formatEstimateGas [ESTIMATE-GAS] Amber Gas estimation calls
formatTxSend [TX-SEND] Lavender Transaction submissions
formatTxReceipt ✓/✗ [TX-RECEIPT] Teal/Coral Transaction confirmations
formatTxRevert ✗ [TX-REVERT] Coral Transaction reverts

Usage Example


 // RPC call logging
 DebugLogger.log(LogFormatter.formatCall("latest", callObject));
 // Output: [CALL] tag=latest
 // to=0x1234...5678
 // data=0xabcd...ef01

 // Transaction logging
 DebugLogger.logTx(LogFormatter.formatTxSend(from, to, nonce, gasLimit, value));
 // Output: [TX-SEND] from=0x1234...5678 to=0xabcd...ef01 nonce=0
 // gasLimit=25200 value=100

 // Error logging
 DebugLogger.logRpc(LogFormatter.formatRpcError(method, code, message, duration));
 // Output: ✗ [RPC-ERROR] method=eth_call code=-32000 message=execution
 // reverted duration=1.5ms

All methods in this class are thread-safe and purely functional (no side effects). The formatted strings are ready to be passed to any logging system.

Since:
0.1.0-alpha
See Also:
